document_data.mainbody:
The Gold Digger was an enchanted greatsword created by the Church of Waukeen sometime before 1368 DR.
The Gold Digger possessed a +1 enchantment and dealt magical damage greater than that of similar weapons. Each successful hit, however, consumed ten gold coins from the wielders pouch. When the swords owner ran out of gold, the weapons acted as a simple mundane greatsword.
The Gold Digger was forged and enchanted in Amn by dwarves who served the Church of Waukeen. In the , the Gold Digger fell into the hands of Lucky Aello, the merchant of Baldurs Gate who ran Lucky Aellos Discount Store located by the city gate leading to the Wyrms Crossing.
